lyric.verse: Suteki na atashi no yume wo Sukoshi no aida kiete yo Kirei na umi to aozora Kuchibiru wo oku kimi no hizato
lyric.chorus: Moshi mo sekai wo tsunagu hikari wo Kamisama no te ga kakusu no nara Atashi wa soo neko no me wo saite Kitto makkanawa wo egaki Anata no naka ni iro wo mitsukeyoo
lyric.verse: Kyonen-yori takusan hana ga Ongaku no yoo ni saita yo Kono yume ga hontoo ni natte Ittai nani ga kawaru no ka na
lyric.chorus: Hiroi sekai no chiisana asa Tashika na mono ni tsutsumareta hibi Kobareru hizashi ni kotoba wa odori Kaze ga fuku yo ni dakishime aeta Sonna ibasho wa tooi kioku Atashi wa koko de egao wo tamesu Anata no nai kawaita hodoo de
lyric.verse: Suteki na atashi no yume to Aru hi no uso ni kitzuitan da Suteki na atashi no yume wo Ashita no gogo ni kanae yoo Kokoro ga mizu ni afumete Kagami no yoo ni sora wo utsushita
lyric.chorus: Moshi mo sekai wo tsunagu hikari wo Kamisama no te ga kakusu no nara Atashi wa soo neko no me wo yaburi Kitto makkanawa wo sagasu Hiroi sekai no chiisana asa Tashika na mono ni tsutsumareta hibi Kobareru hizashi ni kotoba wa utau Hey, hey dakishimete aeta Ai no kioku wa doko de togireru no
lyric.verse: Kirei na umi to aozora Kuchiburi wo oku Kimi no hizato
